articles.title: NASA’s SLS Rocket Opens Like A Tin Can - World Top Trend
articles.description: NASA is headed back to the Moon. It plans to send astronauts back to the lunar surface by 2024 — though that date has seemed a optimistic.
articles.content:
• NASA destroyed its pricey Space Launch System rocket during testing, but it was totally planned.
